item.title: Khadija Al Hanafi - !OK!
item.description:
garbhan

My choice for this week.

Shes a Tunisian producer making chill footwork that samples trap/jazz/synth pop/lounge and stuff. I only listened to the first track so itâ€™ll be fresh for me too. Also a 2025 album

Matt

I did. Listened to it twice and didn’t really find much to hold onto myself. It’s proper Internet music to me and it’s fun that the person that made it is from Tunisia but eh. Lofi hip hop/ footwork type stuff
